Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class Griever

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Griever
public class Griever extends Object
The Griever class represents an enemy character (Griever) in the maze. It is responsible for the Griever's movement, animation, detection of the player, and interactions such as being stunned.

  • Constructor Details

    • Griever

      public Griever(float startX, float startY, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer pathLayer, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer path2Layer)
      Constructs a Griever at the given starting position.
      Parameters:
      startX - The starting X-coordinate of the Griever.
      startY - The starting Y-coordinate of the Griever.
      pathLayer - The path layer used for collision detection.
      path2Layer - The second path layer for movement calculations.

  • Method Details

    • loadGrieversFromTiledMap

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Griever> loadGrieversFromTiledMap(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer pathLayer, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer path2Layer)
      Loads all Griever objects from the provided TiledMap, creating instances of Griever based on the map's properties and adding them to an array.
      Parameters:
      map - The TiledMap containing the game world and Griever data.
      pathLayer - The first path layer used for Griever's movement logic.
      path2Layer - The second path layer used for Griever's movement logic.
      Returns:
      An array of Griever instances loaded from the map.

    • update

      public void update(float delta, float playerX, float playerY, String playerDirection, HUD hud, Player player, Friends friends)
      The main update method orchestrates all the update logic for the Griever. It handles stun state, movement, animation, and checks for collisions with the player.
      Parameters:
      delta - The time in seconds since the last update.
      playerX - The X-coordinate of the player.
      playerY - The Y-coordinate of the player.
      playerDirection - The direction the player is currently facing.
      hud - The HUD (Heads Up Display) that tracks game progress.
      player - The Player instance, for collision detection and interactions.
      friends - The Friends instance, to manage the state of the player's friends.

    • checkPlayerCollision

      public void checkPlayerCollision(Player player, HUD hud, Friends friends, float delta)
      Checks if the Griever collides with the player. If a collision occurs, the player loses a life, and the Griever performs the appropriate actions.
      Parameters:
      player - The player instance.
      hud - The HUD (Heads Up Display) to manage player lives.
      friends - The Friends instance to manage the state of the player's friends.
      delta - The time in seconds since the last update.

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Renders the Griever at its current position using the specified SpriteBatch. The Griever's texture is drawn at the current monsterX and monsterY coordinates, with scaling applied to the texture's width and height.
      Parameters:
      batch - The SpriteBatch used for rendering the Griever's texture.

      public void setPosition(float x, float y)

      public float getMonsterX()

      public boolean isGrieverNotStunned()

    • getHeight

      public float getHeight()

    • getScale

      public float getScale()

    • saveGrieverstate

      public void saveGrieverstate(int index)
      Saves the current state of the Griever (position, stunned state, following state, random movement state, and lives cooldown) to the preferences file.
      Parameters:
      index - The index used to differentiate between different Griever states in the preferences file.

    • loadGrieverstate

      public void loadGrieverstate(int index)
      Loads the Griever's state (position, stunned state, following state, random movement state, and lives cooldown) from the preferences file based on the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index used to load the specific Griever state from the preferences file.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes of all textures related to the Griever to free up memory when no longer needed. This method iterates over all Griever textures and disposes of them.
